text: Ruth Alice "Ronnie" Gilbert (September 7, 1926 â€“ June 6, 2015) was an American folk singer-songwriter, actress and activist. She was one of the original members of The Weavers with Pete Seeger, Lee Hays, and Fred Hellerman. Gilbert was born in New York City. She was the daughter of Jewish immgrants from Eastern Europe. She had one daughter. She was married twice and was bisexual. Gilbert died from natural causes on June 6, 2015 in Mill Valley, California, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American activists Category:American folk musicians Category:American movie actors Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American television actors Category:Bisexual Jews Category:Jewish activists Category:Jewish American LGBT people Category:Jewish American musicians Category:LGBT people from New York City Category:Singers from New York City
title: Ronnie Gilbert
